skill.name: employment-contract-templates
skill.description: Create employment contracts, offer letters, and HR policy documents following legal best practices. Use when drafting employment agreements, creating HR policies, or standardizing employment documentation.
skill.summary: Create employment contracts, offer letters, and HR policy documents following legal best practices. ...
skill.author: wshobson

security_audit.summary: The skill contains static template text and guidance. No code execution, network access, or file system access behavior is present. No data theft or malicious patterns detected.

content.value_statement: You need clear employment documents that cover key sections. This skill provides ready templates and policy wording you can adapt with counsel.
actual_capabilities: Provide an employment offer letter template with standard sections
Provide an employment agreement template with confidentiality and IP clauses
Provide an employee handbook policy section template
List key legal considerations for employment documents
Share do and do not guidance for HR documentation
limitations: Not legal advice or jurisdiction specific guidance
Does not validate enforceability or compliance
Does not auto fill company data or signatures
Does not negotiate or customize clauses beyond templates

use_cases.title: Standardize offer letters
use_cases.description: Create a consistent offer letter format with required sections and contingencies.

use_cases.title: Draft starter agreements
use_cases.description: Generate a basic employment agreement to review with legal counsel.

use_cases.title: Update handbook policies
use_cases.description: Add core handbook policy sections with clear wording and structure.

prompt_templates.title: Offer letter draft
prompt_templates.prompt: Draft an offer letter template for a full time marketing manager in the United States with salary, bonus, benefits, and at will language.

prompt_templates.title: Employment agreement
prompt_templates.prompt: Provide an employment agreement template for a fixed term role with confidentiality, IP assignment, and termination sections.

prompt_templates.title: Handbook policies
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a handbook policy section covering equal employment, anti harassment, attendance, PTO, and acceptable use.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced customization
prompt_templates.prompt: Customize the employment agreement template for a remote role with travel requirements and a 12 month non solicitation clause.

output_examples.input: Create an offer letter template for a marketing manager with standard benefits and a background check contingency.
output: Position details with role, location, start date, and employment type
Compensation section with salary, bonus, and equity placeholders
Contingencies and at will employment language

best_practices: Consult qualified legal counsel for local requirements
Customize terms to match role, location, and employment type
Keep signed copies of finalized documents
anti_patterns: Copying clauses that conflict with local law

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, it is a text based skill that works in all three platforms.

faq.question: What are the limits of the templates?
faq.answer: They are general starting points and are not jurisdiction specific or legal advice.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with HR systems?
faq.answer: You can copy the text into your HR system, but there is no direct integration.

faq.question: Does it access or store my data?
faq.answer: No, it contains static templates and does not access files or networks.

faq.question: What should I do if a clause seems missing?
faq.answer: Add the clause and confirm it with legal counsel for your jurisdiction.

faq.question: How does this compare to paid legal services?
faq.answer: It provides drafts only, while paid services provide legal review and advice.
